title: Rek'Sai Concept Art Skin/Classic Skin
body:
This would be an awesome skin for Rek'Sai{{champion:421}} 
Actually it is/was the concept for Rek'Sai
plz Riot make this a skin

[reddit](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/2vfuoc/reksais_original_concept_art_would_make_a_great/)
